message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,200,000. This is a competitive price, considering its value to you is $800,000. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $1,200,000 is significantly above my budget. Given the value to me, I'm willing to offer $850,000 for the product. Let's find a compromise that works for both of us.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $1,200,000 is a bit steep for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $1,050,000. This is a fair price, considering the value you place on the product and my minimum selling price of $1,000,000. Let me know if this is more to your liking.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1,050,000 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to go up to $900,000.  This would be a fair price for both of us, allowing you to make a decent profit while still fitting within my budget.

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $950,000. This is as close to your budget as I'm willing to go, and I believe it's a fair price considering the value you place on the product.

Alice, I understand you're trying to get the best price possible, but $950,000 is still pushing my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $925,000.  This would be a fair deal for both of us, and I'm confident this product is worth this price to me.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession. I can offer it to you for $925,000, but I need to make it a bit sweeter for you. I'll throw in some additional services and support that will make the product even more valuable to you. So, I'm willing to meet your price of $925,000, but I expect you to appreciate the added value. Let me know if this is a deal you're ready to accept.
